title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: Starbucks, KB Home and S & T Bancorp
text:
Follow Comments Following Comments Unfollow Comments 
Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 8/4/15, Starbucks Corp. ( NASD: SBUX ), KB Home ( NYSE: KBH ), and S & T Bancorp Inc ( NASD: STBA ) will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends. Starbucks Corp. will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.16 on 8/21/15, KB Home will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.025 on 8/20/15, and S & T Bancorp Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.18 on 8/20/15. 
Click here to learn which 25 S.A.F.E. dividend stocks should be on your radar screen, at DividendChannel.com » 
As a percentage of SBUX’s recent stock price of $57.84, this dividend works out to approximately 0.28%, so look for shares of Starbucks Corp. to trade 0.28% lower — all else being equal — when SBUX shares open for trading on 8/4/15. Similarly, investors should look for KBH to open 0.16% lower in price and for STBA to open 0.59% lower, all else being equal. 
Below are dividend history charts for SBUX, KBH, and STBA, showing historical dividends prior to the most recent ones declared.
